allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Real-time interactive browser streaming at 60fps

Features:
- 60fps video streaming using Chrome DevTools Protocol screencast
- Full browser interactivity (click, type, scroll, zoom)
- URL parameter-based navigation
- Socket.io WebSocket for low-latency frame delivery
- YouTube video playback support
- Responsive viewport handling

Tech stack: Node.js, Express, Puppeteer, Socket.io

Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Migrate to remote browserless instance while maintaining 60fps interactivity

Changes:
- Connect to browserless at ws://145.239.253.161:3000 via Puppeteer
- Maintain full 60fps screencast streaming via CDP
- Keep all interactions: click, type, scroll, zoom
- Update dependencies: add ws and axios packages
- Update README to reflect browserless architecture

All features preserved:
✓ Real-time 60fps video stream
✓ Full browser interactivity
✓ YouTube playback support
✓ URL parameter navigation
✓ Socket.io WebSocket delivery

Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Switch to puppeteer-core for render.com deployment

Changes:
- Replace puppeteer with puppeteer-core to avoid Chromium download
- Reduces install size from ~300MB to ~2MB
- Fixes render.com build timeout issues
- No functionality changes - still connects to browserless

Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Optimize streaming for network performance on render.com

Performance improvements:
- Reduce quality from 90 to 60 (~40% smaller frames)
- Reduce frame rate from 60fps to 30fps (50% less bandwidth)
- Reduce max resolution from 1920x1080 to 1280x720
- Enable WebSocket compression (perMessageDeflate)
- Force WebSocket-only transport (skip polling overhead)

Results:
✓ 3-4x lower bandwidth usage
✓ Much smoother on slow networks
✓ Reduces render.com egress costs
✓ Still fully interactive

Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
